reviews.review_msg: Dr.Millar was an exceptional professor, bringing interesting subjects and readings. I am exited to have her next term again
All around had a really good experience with her - she's very passionate about what she does and it's evident by her lectures.

Kathleen is passionate about what she teaches. She loves group discussions and participation. I loved being in her seminars because it was the only class in my semester where I learned something applicable to real life and my program. Marking is fair. Easy to approach and to ask questions. Wished she put slides online more and had more powerpoints
